Airoha M0 BLE API  1.0.5.4
API Reference

The API references.

BLE Stacks API

NameDescription
bt.h BT Initialization and Miscellaneous.
ble_gap.h Generic Access Profile. (GAP)
ble_gap_sm.h Security of Generic Access Profile. (SM)
ble_sm.h Security Manager. (SM)
ble_gatt_server.h Generic Attribute Profile Server Side. (GATT)
ble_gatt_client.h Generic Attribute Profile Client Side. (GATT)
ble_att.h Attribute Protocol. (ATT)
ble_l2cap.h Logic Link Control and Adaptation Protocol. (L2CAP)
bt_contants.h BT constants
